Package HWSystem.Devices

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • HWSystem.Devices.Device
      • HWSystem.Devices.Sensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IMUSensor, TempSensor
    public abstract class Sensor
extends Device
    Represents a general sensor device. This class serves as a base class for specific types of sensors.
